definition: Cowherd of the folk tale Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女/Altair (star)
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth
Cowherd and Weaving maid (characters in folk story)/separated lovers/Altair and Vega (stars)

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor deliberately walked into the river, and clutched Cowherd.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝不慌不忙的走入水中，抓住牛郎。

sentences.english: Tianhe not object to Cowboy wide, but Weaver for Huan Firestone .
sentences.chinese: 牛郎不厭天河闊，織女但求凡世歡。

sentences.english: We can see neither Altair or Ursa Major in the cloudy night sky.
sentences.chinese: 陰天的夜空既看不到牛郎星，也看不到北斗星。

sentences.english: Very imaginative and interesting. Its theme is similar to the Chinese folk story.
sentences.chinese: 富有想象力，主題與中國的牛郎織女相似，很有意趣。

sentences.english: Only once a year, the couple could meet on the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎與織女一年才能在鵲橋上相會一次。

sentences.english: It was that night, in the Milky Way to wash hair will cowboy.
sentences.chinese: 相傳，這天晚上織女會在銀河洗髮去會牛郎。

sentences.english: We couples who have been separated hate the ruthless "The Milky Way".
sentences.chinese: 我們這些牛郎織女都恨透了那條無情的“天河”。

sentences.english: However, it is still a day to celebrate the annual meeting of the loving couple, the Cowherd and the Girl Weaver.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它仍是牛郎織女一年一度的鵲橋相會日。

sentences.english: Midnight Cowboy appears in the third generation of Doida's dam.
sentences.chinese: 午夜牛郎出現在土井田的大壩第三代。

sentences.english: Thus, they began to narrate , like that night, the narrative Cowboy and the Weaver Girl.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他們開始敘說，就像那夜，牛郎和織女的敘說。

sentences.english: The cowherd saw this and offered to take her to his house.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎看到哭泣的織女就把她帶回家。

sentences.english: The most well-known legend is the romantic yet heartrending story of the Cowherd and the Weaving Maid.
sentences.chinese: 最廣爲人知的傳說是牛郎與織女浪漫卻悲傷的故事。

sentences.english: Gigolo even not come, Milky Way still flicker.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎即使不來，銀河依舊閃爍。

sentences.english: Long, long ago, there was an honest and kind-hearted fellow named Niu Lang (Cowhand).
sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，有一個誠實而善良的小夥，名叫牛郎。

sentences.english: The woman of return to the gigolo borns a son a woman.
sentences.chinese: 織女還給牛郎生了一兒一女。

sentences.english: Do you know how to spell "cowboy"?
sentences.chinese: 你知道怎麼拼寫單詞“牛郎”嗎？

definition: magpie bridge across the Milky Way between Altair and Vega where Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed an annual meeting
matchmaker/go-between/same as 月下老人[yue4 xia4 lao3 ren2]
